mapper.select: SELECT proj_tech_id, tech_id, proj_id, del_flag FROM tbl_proj_tech WHERE del_flag = 0 ORDER BY proj_tech_id DESC, reg_date DESC;
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_proj_tech SET tech_id=#{projectTechnology.tech_id}, proj_id=#{projectTechnology.proj_id}, update_id = 1 WHERE proj_tech_id = #{id}
